title: Rename agent templates
description: Support renaming agent templates.
close_reason: No longer relevant: agent templates removed

title: Remove legacy workspace/ backward-compat code
description: After all existing missions are migrated (agenc-2ph), remove the resolveRepoDirpath legacy detection logic in internal/wrapper/wrapper.go that checks for agent/workspace/ subdirectories. Also remove any remaining references to the old workspace structure (hardcoded 'workspace/' rsync exclude in RsyncTemplate, etc). This is pure cleanup.

title: Add 'Enter repo' option to mission new fzf picker
description: The fzf picker in 'mission new' currently only shows existing templates/options. Add an option that lets the user choose 'Enter repo' which drops them into an interactive input screen to specify a repo URL/shorthand manually.

title: Add branch management commands: merge, pr, cleanup
description: Add branch lifecycle management: 'mission ls --unmerged' to list sessions with unmerged branches (showing commits ahead/behind main). 'mission merge <id>' and 'mission merge <id> --squash' to merge session branches into default branch. 'mission pr <id>' to create a GitHub PR from a session branch. 'mission cleanup --merged' to delete all merged session branches. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Missions as Branches' section.

title: Re-implement hot-reloading when Claude files change in mission repo
Add mission rebase command
description: Add 'agenc mission rebase <mission-id>' that triggers git fetch origin && git rebase origin/main on the session branch. Allows users to quickly bring behind-main sessions up to date. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Session Branches Behind Main' section.

title: Switch repo mid-conversation
description: Support switching between agents mid-conversation without losing context.

title: Create MCP server for workspace repo cloning
description: Create an MCP server that allows AgenC agents to clone repos into their workspace directory.

title: Daemon fsnotify on config.yml for single I/O per update cycle
description: Daemon should use fsnotify on config.yml and refresh its understanding of the config only once when updated. Prevents reading the config on every loop — single I/O per update cycle.

title: Make missions repo-oriented with per-session branches
description: Require a repo argument in 'mission new' — no more empty missions. Every mission clones the repo and creates a per-session branch (agenc/session/<short-id>). The branch is the agent's workspace; all changes happen there. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Repo-Oriented Missions' section.

title: Create turns table and record reproducible state tuples
description: Create a 'turns' table in the database (id, mission_id, repo_commit, config_commit, cli_invocation, session_id, created_at). After each agent turn, record the full reproducible state tuple: repo commit from auto-commit, Claude config repo commit, CLI invocation string, and Claude session ID. Enables replay, debugging, A/B testing, and forensic analysis. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Git State Capture' section.

title: Add CLI commands for searching mission session history
description: Create CLI commands that allow searching across past mission session history. Use cases: (1) Claude can search past sessions to help debug issues by finding when similar problems were encountered and how they were resolved. (2) Claude can load context from past sessions into the current conversation to build on previous work. (3) Users can query session history to find specific conversations, decisions, or code changes across missions.

title: Figure out how to run missions in Docker
description: Figure out how to run missions in Docker for isolation and security.

title: Dim palette command descriptions to dark gray
agenc do: support config update actions
description: Currently 'agenc do' only supports new_mission actions. Extend the LLM interpreter to also handle config updates (e.g. 'add repo X', 'sync repo Y', 'set custom command Z'). This requires expanding the system prompt with available config actions, adding new action types to the JSON response schema, and routing parsed actions to the appropriate config subcommands.

title: Unified paletteCommands with tmux keybinding support
close_reason: Implemented unified paletteCommands with tmux keybinding support

title: Highlight 'agenc do' in demo video
Show sidebar terminal in demo video
Show off custom commands in demo video
Show renaming missions for easy recall in demo video
Build CLI command + palette command to upgrade mission Claude config
description: Add an agenc CLI command (e.g. agenc mission update-config) and a corresponding command palette entry so users can manually trigger a config upgrade on running missions from the terminal or via tmux keybinding.

title: Build CLI config option for auto-upgrading mission Claude config
description: Add a configuration option (in config.yml or similar) that enables automatic upgrading of Claude config on running missions whenever the source config changes, without requiring manual intervention.

title: Stop mission palette command stops current window's mission
description: The 'Stop mission' command palette entry should stop the mission running in the current tmux window/pane, rather than prompting the user to pick one. If the user is not in a mission pane, the 'Stop mission' item should not appear in the palette at all.

title: Add tmux subcommand to extract mission UUID from current pane
description: Build a new agenc tmux subcommand (e.g. agenc tmux mission-id) that inspects the current tmux pane and extracts the mission UUID of the mission running in it. This is needed so palette commands can operate on the contextually-relevant mission. Should return an error or empty result if the current pane is not running a mission.

title: Hide 'Stop mission' palette item when not in a mission pane
description: Make the command palette context-aware: the 'Stop mission' entry should only appear when the current pane is running a mission. Use the tmux mission-id subcommand to detect this. If no mission is running in the current pane, omit the item entirely from the palette.

title: Autoreload upon credential change
agenc do can call agenc config commands (e.g. add custom commands)
Add CLI + palette command to reload current mission
description: Add a command to reload the current mission, useful for recovering from login issues or credential problems without restarting

title: Upgrade Claude Code and resume all current missions
description: Add a workflow or command that upgrades the Claude Code binary and then resumes all currently running missions with the new version

title: Agenc manages its own config via missions and agenc do
description: Allow agenc to manage its own configuration through the mission system. Users would edit agenc config by launching missions and using 'agenc do' commands rather than manually editing config files.

title: Add no-focus option to 'agenc tmux window new'
description: Add an option to 'agenc tmux window new' that creates the window without stealing focus. The user fires off a new window and comes back to it later, staying in their current pane.

title: Add inbox for panes needing user attention
description: Provide an 'inbox' mechanism for the user to quickly address tmux panes that need their attention. Optional enhancement: allow the user to configure the ordering algorithm (queue-based FIFO vs stack-based LIFO) for which pane AgenC surfaces first.

title: Build commands for introspecting mission session history
description: Add commands for introspecting mission session history for later analysis. Users should be able to have Claude summarize the chat, or get the raw session text. Useful for reviewing what happened in a mission after the fact.

title: Communicate AgenC value prop using diagrams
description: Create diagrams that communicate the AgenC value proposition. Use visual aids to explain what AgenC does and why it's valuable, making the project more approachable for new users.

title: Add tip to pair AgenC with cmdk
description: In the README tips section, add a suggestion to pair AgenC with cmdk (https://github.com/mieubrisse/cmdk) for an enhanced workflow experience.

title: Show last user prompt in SESSION column of mission ls/resume
description: The SESSION column in 'agenc mission ls', 'agenc mission resume', etc. should display the last user-provided prompt that isn't a system command. System commands like /exit, /login, /mcp, etc. should be skipped when determining what to show. This gives the user a meaningful preview of what each mission session was last working on.

title: Add observability and mission metrics
description: Add observability and mission metrics to track agent and mission health.

title: Migrate existing missions from workspace/ to agent/ structure
description: Write a migration that moves repos from agent/workspace/<repo>/ to agent/ for all existing missions. This allows removing the legacy backward-compat code in the wrapper's resolveRepoDirpath. Run as a one-time migration during agenc startup or as an explicit command. Should handle edge cases: missions with no repo, missions that are currently running (skip or warn), missions that have already been migrated.

title: Drop agent_template column from database
description: Remove the inert agent_template column from the missions table in internal/database/database.go. The column always contains an empty string since agent templates were removed (agenc-ei3). Requires a DB migration to ALTER TABLE missions DROP COLUMN agent_template, plus removing the AgentTemplate field from the Mission struct and all SQL queries that reference it.

title: Surface mission progress and user TODOs via tmux status or overlay
description: Have agenc track what's being worked on across missions (beads in progress, completed, blocked) and surface that information to the user — e.g. via tmux status bar, a popup overlay, or a dashboard command. When missions complete work or get blocked on something that needs user input, agenc should bubble that up as a TODO for the user. Essentially a live task dashboard that aggregates across all running missions so the user always knows what needs their attention.

title: Implement Claude config repo registration and sync
description: Add 'agenc config set claude-config-repo github.com/owner/claude-config' to register a user's Claude config repo. Daemon clones and syncs this repo. After each agent turn, record the config repo's HEAD commit hash as part of the state tuple. Enables diffing configuration between turns. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Claude config commit' in Git State Capture section.

title: Upgrade Claude Code config on running missions
description: Allow upgrading the Claude Code configuration (CLAUDE.md, settings.json, skills, hooks, etc.) on already-running missions without restarting them. When a user updates their agent template or claude-config, running missions should be able to pick up the new config. This is a prerequisite for recording the onboarding Loom video.

title: Integrate beads
description: Integrate the beads issue tracker into the agenc project for structured TODO tracking.

title: Save information for later (research/brainstorming sessions)
description: Some way to save information for later. E.g. doing research in a research tab and wanting to come back to it later.

title: Implement agenc tmux window new
description: Implement 'agenc tmux window new -- <command> [args...]': must be inside agenc session (AGENC_TMUX==1), get current pane ID, create new window adjacent to current with AGENC_PARENT_PANE env var, run command.

title: Popup window for jumping to anything
description: A popup window that allows jumping to anything — new repo, new agent, open a Git worktree on an existing project, whatever.

title: Add tmux hotkey to open shell in current mission directory
description: Add a tmux hotkey (e.g. prefix + T) that opens a new tmux pane/window with a shell whose working directory is the current mission's agent directory. The hotkey should read AGENC_MISSION_UUID from the current window's environment, resolve the mission's agent directory path, and run tmux split-window or new-window with -c pointing there. See specs/tmux-mission-windows.md for context.

title: Slash command for quickly editing agent config
description: Slash command for quickly editing agent config. Maybe need to clone the existing mission. Definitely need to copy the Claude history so the new editing session gets it.

title: Add wrapper window renaming and return-to-parent
description: Add two wrapper changes: (1) On startup when AGENC_TMUX==1, rename window to '<short_id> <repo-name>' (repo name only, no owner). (2) On exit when AGENC_PARENT_PANE is set, focus parent pane's window then parent pane. Both use tmux commands that fail silently if targets don't exist.

title: Implement file popout pane
description: Tmux hotkey (prefix + O) that opens a file picker (fzf-based) listing recently mentioned or modified files in the current session's workspace. Selecting a file opens it in a new tmux split pane via the user's editor. File list derived from session git diff and optionally parsed from recent Claude output. See specs/hyperspace.md 'File Popout Pane' in Tmux Control Plane section.

title: Add SIGHUP to wrapper signal handler
description: Add syscall.SIGHUP to the wrapper's signal handler alongside SIGINT/SIGTERM. Treat SIGHUP identically to SIGINT - forward to Claude, wait for exit, shut down gracefully. This ensures deferred cleanup (PID file removal) runs when tmux kills windows/sessions.

title: Implement friction capture system
description: Create friction annotations table (id, mission_id, turn_id, annotation, created_at) where turn_id links to the turns table for full forensic context. Implement 'agenc friction <text>' command to annotate sessions with friction notes. Build friction analysis queries to find patterns across annotations. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Friction Capture System' section.

title: Implement agenc tmux detach and agenc tmux rm
description: Implement 'agenc tmux detach' (convenience alias for tmux detach-client) and 'agenc tmux rm' (stop all missions, destroy session).

title: Fix missing logging + race condition in template change reload path
description: The configChanged handler in wrapper.go:183-198 has zero logging (unlike the globalConfigChanged handler which logs at line 204). Template rsyncs and state transitions happen silently. Race condition: when Claude exits naturally, both claudeStateIdle (from the Stop hook) and claudeExited arrive on the select simultaneously. If claudeExited wins while state is StateRestartPending (not yet StateRestarting), the wrapper exits at line 181 without restarting — the pending restart is lost.
close_reason: No longer relevant: template reload path removed

title: Simplify mission new picker to repos-only
description: Replace listRepoLibrary/selectFromRepoLibrary/launchFromLibrarySelection in mission_new.go with findReposOnDisk (same function repo edit uses). Remove repoLibraryEntry, repoLibrarySelection structs, formatLibraryFzfLine, resolveAgentTemplate, isAgentTemplate. Keep blank mission sentinel. Always pass empty string for agent template. See specs/repo-direct-checkout.md Change 2.
close_reason: Already done: mission new picker simplified to repos-only

title: Roll agenc-config global CLAUDE settings into agenc defaults
description: Roll the agenc-config global CLAUDE settings into agenc defaults so they ship with the tool.

title: Design keybinding strategy for agenc tmux hotkeys
description: Decide how AgenC should inject tmux keybindings without conflicting with the user's existing tmux config. Options considered: (1) key table via prefix+a then action key — clean isolation but 3 keystrokes, (2) root-level shortcut like Ctrl-g then action key — 2 keystrokes but globally captured, (3) user-managed bindings with 'agenc tmux show-bindings'. Revisit after the core tmux session/window infrastructure is built and usable.

title: Implement tmux session orchestrator
description: Build the session orchestrator that manages a tmux session ('agenc') with one window per active mission. Creates windows when missions start, names them based on repo + description, cleans up on mission end. Provides 'agenc sessions' command to list all active tmux windows with their mission status. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Session Orchestrator' in Tmux Control Plane section.

title: Enable agenc to drive tmux sessions for the user
description: Give agenc the ability to control the user's tmux session — switch windows, send keys to panes, create/close panes, etc. This would let Claude orchestrate across multiple missions and terminal contexts by directly manipulating tmux, rather than requiring the user to manually switch and interact.

title: Auto-stop missions that have completed
description: Detect when a mission's Claude session has finished its work (e.g. Claude is idle and waiting for input after completing the task) and automatically stop/close the mission. Depends on tmux driving capability to read session state and determine completion.

title: Create Claude plugin with skills to manipulate agenc from within a session
description: Build a Claude Code plugin that gives agents skills to interact with agenc from within their current session. Examples: spawn new missions using current session context, kick off investigation missions, query mission status, list running agents. This lets the user ask Claude to do agenc operations naturally in conversation rather than switching to a separate terminal.

title: Capture full CLI invocation in wrapper
description: Extend the wrapper to record the full 'claude' command line (including flags like --system-prompt, --model, --allowedTools) as a string stored per-turn. Users may override behavior via CLI flags invisible to the config repo; capturing the invocation closes this gap. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Claude CLI invocation' in Git State Capture section.

title: New pane opens in MISSION_DIRPATH
description: When opening a new pane from an existing agent session, it should open in the MISSION_DIRPATH.

title: Add tmux hotkey to browse and view mission files via fzf
description: Add a tmux hotkey (e.g. prefix + O) that opens a popup with an fzf picker listing files in the current mission's agent directory. Selecting a file opens it in a viewer (e.g. $EDITOR, less, or bat) in a new tmux pane. The hotkey should read AGENC_MISSION_UUID from the current window's environment to resolve the agent directory path, then run something like: find <agent-dir> | fzf --preview 'bat {}' inside a tmux display-popup. See specs/tmux-mission-windows.md for context.

title: Add tmux command group and string constants
description: Add 'tmux' command group to CLI (agenc tmux), with subcommands structure. Add all necessary string constants to command_str_consts.go.

title: Record Loom onboarding video and embed in README
description: Record a Loom walkthrough video showing how to get started with agenc — install, create a template, open a mission. Embed the video in the README as part of the Quick Start or a dedicated onboarding section so new users can see it in action before trying it themselves.
design: Full script spec lives in docs/demo-video-script.md. See that file for the section-by-section breakdown, voiceover notes, and pre-recording setup checklist.

title: Add 'agenc prime' command to teach Claude how to use agenc
description: Create an 'agenc prime' command (or similar) that agents can call at the start of a session to learn how to interact with agenc. This would output usage instructions, available commands, and interaction patterns so Claude understands how to use the agenc CLI effectively within a mission.

title: Reload on non-CLAUDE.md/settings.json changes
description: Currently only reloads on CLAUDE.md and settings.json changes. Should also reload when skills, subagents, and other config files change.

title: Add Claude Code instructions for installing agenc
description: Add Claude Code instructions for installing agenc (CLAUDE.md or skill that explains how to go install or clone + build).

title: Clone repos directly into agent/ directory
description: Change CreateMissionDir to clone repos directly into the agent/ directory instead of agent/workspace/<repo>/. This eliminates the workspace subdirectory that caused permission prompts (agenc-q74) and conflicting CLAUDE.md files. Includes: updating CopyRepo target to agentDirpath, renaming CopyWorkspace to CopyAgentDir, removing GetMissionWorkspaceDirpath and WorkspaceDirname, updating watchWorkspaceRemoteRefs to use agent/.git/ path, adding resolveRepoDirpath helper for legacy mission compatibility. See specs/repo-direct-checkout.md Changes 1, 5, and Migration section.
close_reason: Implemented: repos now clone directly into agent/ directory

title: Claude command to fire off edits to agent templates
description: Claude command that fires off edits to agent templates directly from a conversation.
close_reason: No longer relevant: agent templates removed

title: Mark window/pane as unread
description: Add some way to mark a window/pane as unread, so you know to come back to it.

title: Eliminate agent template system
description: Remove the entire agent template layer from AgenC. This includes: template CLI commands (template new, template edit, template ls), daemon template updater goroutine, wrapper template polling and restart-on-template-change logic, template rsync from mission creation, agentTemplates config schema, template-commit control file. Users migrate to Claude's native config system (project CLAUDE.md, skills, plugins, subagents). See specs/hyperspace.md 'Eliminating Agent Templates' section.

title: Create frontend app
description: Create a frontend application for agenc.

title: Build session switcher with latest Claude response summaries
description: Create a session switcher (likely tmux hotkey or fzf picker) that shows all active missions with a quick summary of the latest information Claude returned in each. This gives the user at-a-glance visibility into what each mission is doing and lets them quickly jump between sessions without losing track of where things stand.

title: Handoff command: dump context and reload into fresh session
description: Dump the current conversation context to a structured document, then reload it into a fresh session. Enables mid-conversation handoffs without losing context (e.g. switching models, recovering from context bloat, resuming later). Could serialize key context (task description, decisions made, current state, open questions) into a structured doc. Fresh session loads the doc and picks up where the previous one left off.

title: New mission: split Claude + working directory
description: When calling a new mission, open one half Claude and the other half the working directory of the thing.

title: Implement fork conversation hotkey
description: Tmux hotkey (prefix + F) that snapshots the current session state tuple, creates a new tmux window with a forked mission starting from the same repo state (branch from current commit) and conversation history. Original session continues uninterrupted. Enables A/B testing prompts and exploring alternative approaches. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Fork Conversation' in Tmux Control Plane section.

title: Agent autonomy metric for sessions
description: Metric tracking how autonomously an agent operated during a session.

title: Detect and flag session branches behind main
description: During repo polling (or on-demand via mission ls), compare each active session branch against the remote default branch. If origin/main has commits not in the session branch, flag it as behind. Display a visual indicator in 'mission ls' (e.g. down-arrow-3 meaning 3 commits behind). See specs/hyperspace.md 'Session Branches Behind Main' section.

title: Implement interrogate session hotkey
description: Tmux hotkey (prefix + I) that opens a side pane (tmux split) running a separate Claude instance with read-only access to the current session's JSONL history. Lets the developer ask questions about what happened without interrupting the running agent. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Interrogate' in Tmux Control Plane section.

title: Implement agenc tmux attach
description: Implement 'agenc tmux attach': version check (>=3.0), resolve abs binary path, create session if needed with 'agenc mission new' as initial command, set AGENC_TMUX=1 and AGENC_DIRPATH env vars, attach. Handle nested attach detection and race condition on early cancel.

title: Auto-analyze missions and suggest fixes when things go wrong
description: Have agenc continuously monitor running missions — analyzing session output, progress, and patterns — to detect when things aren't going well (e.g. agent is stuck, looping, making wrong decisions, hitting repeated errors). When issues are detected, proactively surface suggestions to the user on how to fix them (e.g. adjust the prompt, add a permission, provide context). Related to agenc-9pb (tmux driving) as it could use tmux access to read session output.

title: Update README to mention hot-reloading once feature is re-implemented
Add 'Talk to agenc' option in mission new picker
description: Add an option in the 'mission new' fzf picker to open a Claude instance that knows how to interact with agenc itself. This Claude session would have permissions and instructions to run agenc CLI commands — query missions, list templates, check daemon status, etc. Essentially a meta-mission where the agent manages agenc rather than working on a repo.

title: Auto-commit and auto-push after every agent turn
description: Extend the Stop hook to auto-commit all workspace changes after every agent turn, then auto-push to remote. Builds on existing hook injection in claude_config_sync.go. Ensures no work is lost in ephemeral mission directories and enables branch management tooling. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Auto-Commit After Every Turn' and 'Auto-Push After Every Commit' sections.

title: Fix asking for permissions to read repos error
description: Fix the 'asking for permissions to read repos inside the workspace' error. Potentially solvable through Docker isolation.

title: Extend background jobs with repo-orientation and GitHub Actions
description: Extend existing cron infrastructure so background crons always target a repo and create session branches (like interactive missions). Add GitHub Actions integration for interval-based background work (security audits, doc sync, test coverage, dependency updates). Background work is automatically captured in git. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Background Jobs' section.

title: Launch on Hacker News
description: Prepare and execute a Hacker News launch post for agenc. This includes writing the post, choosing the right framing, and timing the submission. Blocked by the Loom onboarding video being ready.

title: Find or build inter-agent chat system
description: Find or build a system that allows agents to communicate with each other.

title: Implement pop/push mission stack
description: Tmux hotkeys (prefix + P for pop, prefix + U for push) for stack-based quick-switch between missions. Push saves current mission to a stack and switches to a target. Pop returns to the most recently pushed mission. Replaces ad-hoc tab-hunting. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Pop / Push' in Tmux Control Plane section.

title: Add Bash aliases to cd to agent workdir
description: Add Bash aliases so you can cd to an agent's working directory.

title: Implement personal orchestrator agent
description: An always-running agent in its own tmux window that serves as the developer's control plane. Capabilities: query individual sessions ('what happened in auth-fix?'), query all sessions ('which are stuck?'), proactively surface lessons ('that looked like a bad pattern'), accept friction annotations via natural language. Aggregates multiple sessions into a single decision-making interface. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Personal Orchestrator Agent' in Tmux Control Plane section.

title: Add crons with scheduled work tracker
description: Add cron support with a scheduled work tracker. Dump work into a queue, cron picks it up.

title: Plan out a better way to stay at higher level
description: Plan out a better way to stay at a higher level, not needing to be so down-in-the-weeds with agent management.

title: Implement terminal-in-mission-directory hotkey
description: Tmux hotkey (prefix + T) that opens a new tmux pane with a shell in the active mission's workspace repo directory. Gives the developer immediate terminal access for running tests, inspecting files, checking git status, or other manual investigation. See specs/hyperspace.md 'Terminal in Mission Directory' in Tmux Control Plane section.

title: Adopt a database schema migration tool
description: Replace the hand-rolled migration functions in internal/database/database.go (migrateWorktreeSourceToGitRepo, migrateAddLastHeartbeat, migrateAddShortID, etc.) with a proper schema migration tool. Evaluate options (golang-migrate, goose, atlas, etc.) and adopt one. Migrations should be versioned, ordered, and idempotent. This will make future schema changes safer and more maintainable as the number of migrations grows.

title: Check daemon perf of constant PID-alive checks
description: Check whether the daemon's constant 'is this PID alive?' checks cause performance issues. Profile and optimize if needed.

title: Remove --agent flag from mission new and repo edit
description: Remove the --agent flag and agentFlag/repoEditAgentFlag variables from mission_new.go and repo_edit.go. Remove all code paths that reference agentFlagName. Update resolveCloneAgentTemplate to inherit source mission template without resolving. Update command Long help text. See specs/repo-direct-checkout.md Change 3.

title: Build turn inspection commands
description: Build 'agenc turn ls' to list recorded turns for a mission (showing repo commit, config commit, timestamp) and 'agenc turn inspect <turn-id>' to display the full state tuple for a specific turn. Enables debugging and forensic analysis of agent interactions. See specs/hyperspace.md 'What This Enables' in Git State Capture section.
